data.title: Luigi Cimara Filmography, List of Luigi Cimara Movies and TV Shows
data.meta_description: Films starring Luigi Cimara. Also features Luigi Cimara TV shows. Latest movies featuring Luigi Cimara. Luigi Cimara DVDs. The list includes TV series, TV movies, short films and movie appearances. The filmography list includes the title, the title's year of release, and the character played by Luigi Cimara, where applicable.
